Reviews.Title: “They make you feel confenient.”
Reviews.Author: amsterdam_beagle
Reviews.Content: spanish situations lack speaking english hopeless arrival hotel handouts little english spoke subscribe feel comfortable elderly lady duty morning arrival understood questions left lugguage sort lobby hotel afternoon found arranged promised extras desk breakfast corner drinks served 247 outside minibar reservation low budget surprised

Reviews.Title: “Just in heart of Madrid city center”
Reviews.Author: Konstantin T
Reviews.Content: positive outstanding stuff jose speaks perfect english spannish russian maybe price location free wifi location clean sol plaza 5min walking distance city tour bus shopping 5min walking distance shops jamon museum 3min walking distance negative breakfast definitely recommend luck

Reviews.Title: “Great location and value”
Reviews.Author: cdmm58
Reviews.Content: stayed 10 nights found hotel extremely positioned sol plaza mayor prado etc bargain warm charm walls thin neighbors heard times thats spain lively neighborhood lots tapa copa bars security madrid 7 times time definitely

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: sonia02gh
Reviews.Content: hotel situated center town near metro station sevilla sol plenty restaurants bars near hotel clean facing interior court noise indeed quiet floor wasn’t light cleaning daily bathroom articles replaced daily didn’t enjoy bed wasn’t comfortable staff doesn’t speak english able articulate english weren’t extremely friendly ok definitely recommend hotel consider pay couples visit city

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant location, old fashion room but noisy”
Reviews.Author: YW L
Reviews.Content: location hotel walking distance touristy locations makes feel youre spain sometimes 5 star hotel makes forget fashioned looks family run proper furniture bed bath size found wifi bit noisy close main road staffs friendly speak limited english cant complain price paid service value

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant!”
Reviews.Author: R0zaS
Reviews.Content: booked hotel id allured location price price ready live windows pleasantly surprised pretty lot empty space bed minus id booked doublebed instead offered eventually maid allowed hotel move furniture conditioner stayed december useless bathroom actual bathtub instead shower clean clean service everyday disappointment allowed eat hid jamon purse staff nice days nice woman spoke spanish italian evenings nights spoke english russian location absolutely excellent 4 minutes walk main square puerta del sol reach main attractions fast prado 10 minutes palacio real 15 minutes left metro station fast metro station numerous shops restaurants etc enjoyed staying hotel santander

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but light sleepers beware”
Reviews.Author: BackpackerNoMore62
Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel santander nights beginning trip visited morocco reasonably priced proximity major madrid museums santander provided reasonably nicely furnished comfortable beds hotel elevator walk stairs central share street noises faced street main wife light sleeper definitely ear plugs

Reviews.Title: “Great location and great sleep quality”
Reviews.Author: Zastrow_Lindsey
Reviews.Content: star hotel nice spacious bit expensive enjoyed stay able sleep everynight disturbance hotel near plaza de cibeles madrid goes celebrate futbol win stayed real madrid won copa del rey actually able sleep window

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: StevenHoe
Reviews.Content: hotel selected reviewing budget hotels centre sol region madrid selection cheapest reasonable reviews weve requested quiet street double bed arrival exact prepared 103 bed bit hard totally quiet staff friendly helped reservations etc hotel clean roomy european standards excellent stay low budget price

Reviews.Title: “Great value, great location”
Reviews.Author: Javamonsoon
Reviews.Content: hotel center madrid rate night saved money walking central location clean bathroom clean little noisy outside expected central location internet hotel local starbucks free wifi connections

Reviews.Title: “Not what was expected”
Reviews.Author: CaptDrakes
Reviews.Content: location thats wifi bed bit firm knocking sound occurred night probably radiator posted rules mentioned website food cant wash clothes bathroom etc sleepless night change hotels gentleman front desk offered resistance polite

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: RTravels143
Reviews.Content: boyfriend booked hotel told little apprehensive reading reviews pleased price fair location look house bed size shower hot maid changed sheets everyday id definitely recommend hotel simple staff friendly didnt conversation answered questions friendly doing

Reviews.Title: “Great location with great price but seems like grandmother's house!”
Reviews.Author: OMPAC
Reviews.Content: tell looking hotel madrid central safe location low price clean ensuite bathroom santander thats rate thats fancy hotel amenities i´m aware thats hotel spend time nice sleep nigth day night madrid confortable sleeping grandmothers house look antique feeling
